TabbyML /

      tabby---Self-hosted AI coding assistant

nvm-sh /

      nvm---Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

apify /

      crawlee-python---Crawlee—A web scraping and browser automation library for Python to build reliable crawlers. Extract data for AI, LLMs, RAG, or GPTs. Download HTML, PDF, JPG, PNG, and other files from websites. Works with BeautifulSoup, Playwright, and raw HTTP. Both headful and headless mode. With proxy rotation.

szimek /

      sharedrop---Easy P2P file transfer powered by WebRTC - inspired by Apple AirDrop

Significant-Gravitas /

      AutoGPT---AutoGPT is the vision of accessible AI for everyone, to use and to build on. Our mission is to provide the tools, so that you can focus on what matters.

grpc /

      grpc-go---The Go language implementation of gRPC. HTTP/2 based RPC

codecrafters-io /

      build-your-own-x---Master programming by recreating your favorite technologies from scratch.

PaddlePaddle /

      PaddleOCR---Awesome multilingual OCR toolkits based on PaddlePaddle (practical ultra lightweight OCR system, support 80+ languages recognition, provide data annotation and synthesis tools, support training and deployment among server, mobile, embedded and IoT devices)

MystenLabs /

      sui---Sui, a next-generation smart contract platform with high throughput, low latency, and an asset-oriented programming model powered by the Move programming language

bunkerity /

      bunkerweb---🛡️ Make your web services secure by default !

karpathy /

      llm.c---LLM training in simple, raw C/CUDA

openvinotoolkit /

      openvino---OpenVINO™ is an open-source toolkit for optimizing and deploying AI inference

flutter /

      flutter---Flutter makes it easy and fast to build beautiful apps for mobile and beyond
